context: Barney, this is about the building.

What do you want to do tonight?
chatbota: We're sorry, it's been a pleasure meeting you, sir. You seem to be in good hands.

I love you, man.

No. But you do have a boyfriend.
I can't. The Professor said you were a good human being.

And now I'm on the verge of turning my back on the world.

Well, he's been great. You think you could live without him?

Sure. No problem.

I don't know. But I'm sure we can. Maybe I'll try and sneak in while you're there.
